data.lyric:
[ti:Buy My Own Drinks]
[ar:Runaway June]
[al:Runaway June  - EP]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Buy My Own Drinks - Runaway June
[00:01.66]Composed by：Hannah Mulholland/Hillary Lindsey/Jennifer Wayne/Josh Kear/Naomi Cooke/Runaway June
[00:03.32]Mmm yeah
[00:06.75]Mmm hmm
[00:10.06]Well since we been done
[00:11.59]I've been trying to un-fall apart
[00:15.99]And I've been thinking that some neon lights
[00:18.45]Would be a real good start
[00:22.23]Well I called a couple friends
[00:23.94]But they all say they're staying in
[00:25.58]So I guess I'm going out on my own
[00:28.19]I might be heart broke
[00:29.99]But that don't mean that I'm gonna stay home yeah
[00:33.70]I can buy my own drinks
[00:36.79]I can pay my own tab
[00:39.81]At the end of the night
[00:41.58]When they cut on all the lights
[00:43.14]I can call my own cab
[00:46.66]I can drop my own change in the jukebox
[00:49.88]I can dance all by myself
[00:52.57]'Til I can stop thinkin' 'bout drinkin' 'bout him
[00:55.50]I don't need nobody else
[00:57.88]Yeah I can buy my own drinks
[01:01.03]Tonight tonight tonight
[01:03.95]Yeah I can buy my own drinks
[01:07.55]Tonight tonight tonight
[01:11.59]Found myself a dive
[01:13.16]The type he would never walk in
[01:16.22]Yeah
[01:17.55]And then a guy at the bar sees
[01:19.67]An empty drink in my hand
[01:23.21]Yeah I said sweet of you to ask
[01:25.50]If you could fill my glass
[01:26.95]But I'm gonna have to pass this time
[01:29.78]Me and myself well we're doing just fine
[01:35.74]I can buy my own drinks
[01:38.31]I can pay my own tab
[01:41.33]At the end of the night
[01:43.03]When they cut on all the lights
[01:44.81]I can call my own cab
[01:48.34]I can drop my own change in the jukebox
[01:51.30]I can dance all by myself
[01:54.12]'Til I can stop thinkin' 'bout drinkin' 'bout him
[01:57.00]I don't need nobody else
[01:59.40]Yeah I can buy my own drinks
[02:02.78]Tonight tonight tonight
[02:05.44]Yeah I can buy my own drinks
[02:08.77]Tonight tonight tonight
[02:12.95]I can walk my own self to the front door
[02:15.89]I can take my own self to bed
[02:18.91]I can medicate my own headache
[02:22.09]I can be my own boyfriend
[02:26.05]And I can buy my own drinks
[02:29.09]I can pay my own tab
[02:32.09]At the end of the night
[02:33.78]When they cut on all the lights
[02:35.33]I can call my own cab
[02:39.03]I can drop my own change in the jukebox
[02:42.18]I can dance all by myself
[02:44.75]'Til I can stop thinkin' 'bout drinkin' 'bout him
[02:47.81]I don't need nobody else
[02:50.63]Yeah I can buy my own drinks
[02:53.24]Tonight tonight tonight
[02:56.00]Yeah I can buy my own drinks

[03:03.67]I can drop my own change in the jukebox
[03:06.18]Tonight tonight tonight
[03:09.64]I can dance all by myself tonight tonight
data.trans:
[ti:Buy My Own Drinks]
[ar:Runaway June]
[al:Runaway June  - EP]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:01.66]//
[00:03.32]//
[00:06.75]//
[00:10.06]自从我们分手以后
[00:11.59]我游走在崩溃的边缘 一直压抑自己
[00:15.99]我一直想沉浸在灯红酒绿的日子里
[00:18.45]那会不会是一个好的开始吗
[00:22.23]我给朋友们打电话 叫他们出来玩一玩
[00:23.94]可是他们说要待在家里
[00:25.58]所以我只能一个人出去
[00:28.19]我可能很伤心
[00:29.99]但那不意味着我必须待在家里
[00:33.70]我可以一个人喝酒
[00:36.79]我可以自己付钱
[00:39.81]夜晚结束 黎明到来
[00:41.58]酒吧打烊的时候
[00:43.14]我可以单独叫辆出租车
[00:46.66]我可以单独点首歌
[00:49.88]我可以独自跳舞
[00:52.57]直到我不再想他 沉迷他为止
[00:55.50]我不需要任何人 我想一个人待着
[00:57.88]我可以一个人喝酒
[01:01.03]今晚
[01:03.95]我可以一个人喝酒
[01:07.55]今晚
[01:11.59]我坐在小酒吧里
[01:13.16]他不愿踏入的那种地方
[01:16.22]//
[01:17.55]酒吧里的一个男人
[01:19.67]看见我手里的空杯子
[01:23.21]我说你问得真好
[01:25.50]你愿意和我一起喝酒吗
[01:26.95]可惜我不能答应你
[01:29.78]我自己一个人就刚刚好
[01:35.74]我可以一个人喝酒
[01:38.31]我可以自己付钱
[01:41.33]夜晚结束 黎明到来
[01:43.03]酒吧打烊的时候
[01:44.81]我可以单独叫辆出租车
[01:48.34]我可以单独点首歌
[01:51.30]我可以独自跳舞
[01:54.12]直到我不再想他 沉迷他为止
[01:57.00]我不需要任何人 我想一个人待着
[01:59.40]我可以一个人喝酒
[02:02.78]今晚
[02:05.44]我可以一个人喝酒
[02:08.77]今晚
[02:12.95]我可以自己走到家门口
[02:15.89]我可以一个人睡觉
[02:18.91]我可以独自疗伤
[02:22.09]我可以做自己的男友
[02:26.05]我可以一个人喝酒
